segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the edge of the sink, and it’s getting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely ignoring it, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are about to cause another disaster with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching for those cookies, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to step in and fix this before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting, and it’s kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman wakes up and notices what’s happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and it’s only going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
